Pre-Game Insights: The Cincinnati Reds will look to sweep a three-game series with a victory against the Pittsburgh Pirates.
Cincinnati is 39-41 in home games and 76-80 overall.
Pittsburgh has a 72-83 record overall and a 34-43 record in road games.
The Pirates are 39-18 in games when they did not give up a home run.
This is the 13th time these teams have squared off this season. The Pirates are up 7-5 in the season series.
